name: backend
description: This is my #DevCTrainingWithAndela Capstone Project 'Team-work' Backend. Teamwork is an internal social network for employees of an organization. The goal of this application is to facilitate more interaction between colleagues and promote team bonding.

scripts.test: set process.env.NODE_ENV=test && node src/usingDB/db/db.js dropArticleTable && node src/usingDB/db/db.js dropUserTable && node src/usingDB/db/db.js createUserTables && mocha --recursive --exit || true
scripts.db-refresh:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test && node src/usingDB/db/db.js dropAllTables && node src/usingDB/db/db.js createAllTables
scripts.db-refresh:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && node src/usingDB/db/db.js dropAllTables && node src/usingDB/db/db.js createAllTables
